sentences.en: A tunnel was not considered economically feasible.
sentences.cn: 从经济上考虑,用隧道并不可行.

sentences.en: Economically and politically, this affair couldn't come at a worse time.
sentences.cn: 无论从经济上还是政治上来看，这件事来得都太不是时候了。

sentences.en: In economically advanced countries, women marry later.
sentences.cn: 在经济发达国家，女性结婚比较晚。

sentences.en: It is only their investment that makes the programme economically viable.
sentences.cn: 因为他们的投资,这个项目在经济上才得以通过.

sentences.en: Now is the time when we must all live as economically as possible.
sentences.cn: 现在到了我们都必须尽可能节衣缩食的时候了。

sentences.en: Services could be operated more efficiently and economically.
sentences.cn: 服务的提供可以更加高效、更加节省。

sentences.en: Small English orchards can hardly compete economically with larger French ones.
sentences.cn: 英国的小型果园很难在经济上和法国的大型果园竞争。

sentences.en: The company is in an economically vulnerable position.
sentences.cn: 该公司目前经济状况不稳定.

sentences.en: The country has made enormous strides politically but not economically.
sentences.cn: 该国在政治上取得了巨大的发展，但经济却跟不上去。

sentences.en: The country was going down the tubes economically.
sentences.cn: 该国经济正在彻底崩溃。

sentences.en: The factory is no longer economically viable.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂在经济上已经维持不下去了。

sentences.en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentences.cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

sentences.en: They were unable to run the telephone network economically.
sentences.cn: 他们未能经济地经营电话网络.

sentences.en: This region is becoming increasingly important both strategically and economically.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的战略地位和经济地位变得越来越重要了.

sentences.en: We produce food as economically as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们生产食品时力求节省。

words.tran_cn: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家
经济地；在经济上；节俭地

phrases.tran_cn: 经济上可行的，经济上合算

trans.tran_cn: 节约地，节省地，经济地，在经济上
trans.tran_en: in a way that is related to systems of money, trade, or business
